sentences.sContent: The head of Job Anderson , the boatswain, appeared at the middle loophole.
sentences.sContent_eng: The head of Job Anderson , the boatswain, appeared at the middle loophole.
sentences.sCn: 水手长乔伯-安德森的脑袋出现在了中间那个枪眼里。

sentences.sContent: And I was going to sea myself, to sea in a schooner, with a piping boatswain and pig-tailed singing seamen, to sea, bound for an unknown island, and to seek for buried treasure!
sentences.sContent_eng: And I was going to sea myself, to sea in a schooner, with a piping boatswain and pig-tailed singing seamen, to sea, bound for an unknown island, and to seek for buried treasure!
sentences.sCn: 而我本人也即将出海，乘着双桅船，和一个吹哨子的水手长以及留着辫子、唱着歌的水手们一道出海； 出海，驶向一个不知名的岛，去寻找埋藏着的宝藏！

trans.tranOther: a petty officer on a merchant ship or a warrant officer on a warship who is responsible for the maintenance of the ship and its equipment
